mdRecord.dcterms:title: The reports of Edward Bulstrode: Of divers resolutions and judgements, given .. by the grave, reverend, and learned judges, and sages of the law. Of cases and matters in law: with the reasons and causes of their said resolutions and judgements, given in the Court of King's Bench in the time of the late reign of King James [and the beginning of King Charls. 1609-1626]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and G. Bedell
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Vols. 2-3 have title: The second [-third] part of the reports of Edward Bulstrode.
"There is a chasm in paging in part II ... from 99-109 ... but the book is nevertheless complete."--Soule, Lawyer's ref. manual, 1884.
LAW: Copy one has signature: Jeremy Bentham, Lincoln's Inn.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain
